title: Beginners Skiing or Snowboarding Lesson for £26 at Chill Factore (Up to £70Value)
highlights:
• Learn fundamentals in a Beginner Level 1 lesson
  • Lesson lasts 1 hour 50 minutes
  • UK’s longest indoor real snow slope
  • Includes hire of boots, skis, snowboard, and ski poles
  • Optional clothes hire available at £5
  • Close to Manchester Trafford Centre
  • Open late 7 days a week
  • Other snow activities available

title: Spa Getaway for Two for One Night (£54) or Two Nights (£99) at Mercure Bolton Last Drop Village Hotel and Spa (Save up to 56%)
highlights:
• Chocolate and fudge box amenities for one-night stay - Bottle of wine in the room for two-night stay 
  • Breakfast included on both days
  • Full access to spa and leisure facilities, 25% discount on spa treatments 
  • 15% off food in the restaurant
  • Additional night carries 50% discount 
  • Close to local attractions

title: Eight Sessions of Boot Camp Fitness With Assault Course for £9.95 at Map Challenges (£52 Value)
highlights:
• 13 sessions per week to choose from
  • Mixture of exercises such as boxing and martial arts
  • Army style assault course with 42 obstacles
  • Variety of different exercises in each session
  • Various ladies only sessions on offer
